s.text: The United States has got to be careful not to strut its stuff in ways that might disincline other countries from cooperating with it.
Now these organizations that served what we used to think of as "the West" and "the North" are opening up to the developing and democratizing nations of the East and the South.

But these days U.S. power is subject to a form of ambivalence verging on antagonism--even from allies--that goes beyond the merits and motivations of this or that particular criticism.
